activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.notes.pro.activities.SimpleActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as the main interface for the Notes application, providing functionalities such as viewing, creating, and managing notes.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.notes.pro.activities.SettingsActivity

static_properties.text: Place cursor to the end of note
Show a note picker on startup
Place cursor to the end of note
Show a note picker on startup

activities.summary: This activity is used for managing application settings, including color customization, general settings, text formatting, startup behavior, saving options, note migration (import/export), and automatic backup configurations.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.notes.pro.activities.MainActivity
activities.summary: The MainActivity serves as the main interface for managing notes, including creating, editing, saving, deleting, and searching notes. It supports both text and checklist note types, handles incoming intents (e.g., shared text or files), provides printing/exporting capabilities, manages UI interactions via a ViewPager, and includes search functionality, contextual actions, and app shortcuts.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.notes.pro.activities.WidgetConfigureActivity

static_properties.text: Thank you for using Simple Notes.\nFor more simple apps please visit SimpleMobileTools.com.

activities.summary: The WidgetConfigureActivity is used for configuring app widget settings, including selecting a note to display, customizing background and text colors, toggling the visibility of the note title, and saving the configuration. It initializes variables, manages UI elements dynamically, persists user preferences, and broadcasts updates to the widget.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.notes.pro.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: A brief summary of the activity's functionality.For example:this activity is used for setting, which include set theme,color,size.
